Physical Exam: Vital signs (temperature, pulse, blood pressure, respiratory rate)
Justification: To assess overall health and well-being.
To assess for any abnormalities in the head, face, and neck.
To assess for any abnormalities in the respiratory system.
To assess for any abnormalities in the cardiovascular system.
To assess for any abnormalities in the gastrointestinal system.

Physical Exam: Musculoskeletal system examination (range of motion, strength)
Justification: To assess for any abnormalities in the musculoskeletal system.
To assess for any abnormalities in the neurological system.
